about_the_game:
Space Kitten: An Easy Survival Game

Welcome to Space Kitten: An Easy Survival Game, where adorable meets challenging in an immersive space survival adventure. Despite its charming, child-friendly aesthetic, this game will put your crafting skills to the test with a procedurally generated survival experience focused on resource management and farming.

Join our intrepid Space Kitten as you venture into uncharted territories of a vibrant alien planet. Every corner holds secrets and resources crucial for your survival. From whimsical forests to alien deserts, each procedurally generated biome offers unique challenges and delightful surprises. Equip yourself, explore the unknown, and uncover hidden treasures that could be the key to your survival.

Use your timing skills to successfully extract the planet's hidden treasures and materials. Utilize these resources to craft tools and structures that will aid you in your quest for survival. The intricate crafting system allows you to create a wide array of items, each with its own purpose and benefit. Build cozy shelters, forge powerful tools, and engineer advanced technology to enhance your capabilities.

Survival hinges on effective resource management and sustainable farming. Cultivate adorable crops and manage your farm to ensure a steady supply of food and other essential resources. As the environment grows harsher, maintaining a balanced ecosystem becomes increasingly challenging. Adapt your farming strategies, improve your agricultural techniques, and ensure your survival in the face of adversity.

The climate is dynamic and ever-changing. Prepare for whimsical yet harsh weather conditions, unexpected disasters, and the constant threat of an unknown alien world. Your ability to adapt and plan ahead will determine your success. Will you be able to sustain yourself long enough for the rescue team to arrive?

Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Each playthrough offers a unique and unpredictable environment.

  • Comprehensive Crafting System: Craft a variety of tools and structures to aid in your survival.

  • Dynamic Resource Management: Balance resource gathering, farming, and crafting to sustain your life.

  • Challenging Environmental Hazards: Survive against the whimsical elements, natural disasters, and threats of an unknown world.

  • Strategic Farming: Develop and manage your farm to ensure a steady supply of essential resources.

Demo Features:

  • 3 out of 6 unique biomes

  • Approximately 20% of all recipes and items

  • Approximately 25% of all plants, resources, and environmental details

  • Experience freezing temperatures, heat waves, heavy rain, and thunderstorms in each procedurally generated world

  • Approximately 10% of all machines, buildings, and structures

  • Shortened playtime to 5 days for each run

Embark on a delightful yet challenging journey of survival, resourcefulness, and resilience. Can you withstand the adorable trials of this alien world until rescue arrives? Dive in and find out in Space Kitten: An Easy Survival Game!

fullgame.name: Space Kitten: An Easy Survival Game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS 16.04/Steam Machine. Requires Libgcc 6 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS 16.04/Steam Machine. Requires Libgcc 6 or higher
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Space Kitten: An Easy Survival Game by Eddy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 - 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A space survival, procedurally generated crafting game focused on resource management and farming. Explore, gather, and mine for resources to survive the increasingly harsh environment. Sustain and build your farm until your rescue team arrives.
